pageProduct.name: QV Baby Gentle Wash 500G
pageProduct.description:
General Information

QV Baby Gentle Wash is a moisturising soap-free daily wash, suitable for use every day for hair and body on delicate or sensitive skin. QV Baby Gentle Wash is Paediatrician recommended.
Suitable for use every day and with conditions such as eczema, dermatitis and psoriasis.
Mild cleansing for hair & body.
Non-drying formulation.
Fragrance free.
Soap free.
pH balanced.
Colour free.
Lanolin free.
With Vitamin B3 to help support the skin barrier.
Made in Australia.
Proud supporters of the Eczema Association of Australia
Developed for Queen Victoria Hospital

Warnings

Avoid eyes.  For external use only. If lather enters eyes, rinse with clean water.  If irritation occurs, discontinue use. 

Common Uses

Infants, eczema, dermatitis and psoriasis

Ingredients

Aqua (Water), Glycerin, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Lauryl Betaine, Niacinamide, Aminomethyl Propanol, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Methylparaben, Ethylparaben.

Directions

Apply desired amount of QV Baby Gentle Wash to wet skin and lightly massage.  Rinse and gently pat skin dry. For best results apply QV Baby Moisturising Cream immediately after bathing.
